Basics.name: Carlos Alvarez
Basics.label: Project Management, Growth Hacking, Digital Marketing
Basics.summary:
I work as a project manager produce marketing campaigns in the performance driven direct response space. I manage teams in web development, web design, media buying, and data analytics.   

While I enjoy all aspects of the build process, my greatest skill is analyzing data trends to optimize and create actionable steps to bring in the most favorable return on investment.

In my spare time you can find me digging in open source web projects. I am available for hire and I thrive in a performance based role or partnership.

Work History.summary:
Project Manager and Digital Media Specialist.

As a project manager I procure of services from a global team of freelancers and consultants for eCommerce development, content creation, web design, media buying, and web development. I manage the entire development lifecyle and all aspects of delivery from conception to launch. 

Highlights:

Scaled 5 different products in 2015 from concept to launch totally sales of +$8M USD

I've identified and created a marketing strategy to bring consumer awareness to each product and brand.

Analyzed reports from Google Analytics and created A/B testing to optimize campaigns.

Software Engineering Study Abroad
Knowledge of System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) Agile and Waterfall methodologies 
Requirements Analysis & Specification
Structured & Object Oriented Design
Software Testing and Quality Frameworks

Supervised and managed over 30 employees
Managed the business to generate over $800K in 2002, $1.5M in 2003 and over $3M in new construction projects each year from 2004-2007.


The 2007 global real estate market bust forced the close of this business.
